title: Project Report Q4 2025
author: Development Team
summary: This quarter focused on implementing data context support for dynamic document generation. The jsx-docx system now allows users to pass JSON configuration files as runtime parameters, enabling template-based DOCX generation with dynamic content.
items: Implemented data context parameter in JsRuntime
Added --data CLI option for JSON file input
footer: This document was automatically generated from a JSX template with dynamic data context.
